wpm.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • wpm.data.DataManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    saf.components.AppDataComponent

    public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements saf.components.AppDataComponent
    This class serves as the data management component for this application.

        public void reset()
        This function clears out the HTML tree and reloads it with the minimal tags, like html, head, and body such that the user can begin editing a page.
